function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hospitals designed without containment spaces for walk-in patients and visitors, without internal containment options between wards, and without containment options in emergency departments","Impact":"Risk of rapid spread of contagious diseases within the hospital environment, leading to increased infection rates and overwhelmed healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Incorporate containment spaces for walk-in patients, consider spatial layout of wards, operating theatres, and emergency departments, and implement compartmentalized ventilation management with well-thought-out pressure differentials","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, spatial design considerations for healthcare facilities","People":"Patients, visitors, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital administrators, healthcare facility designers"},{"Description":"Lack of design considerations for urban green spaces in the post-pandemic era","Impact":"Reduced access to safe and socially distanced recreational spaces during a pandemic, leading to potential overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Reconsider urban green space design for post-pandemic era, incorporate stratified set of green spaces with diverse recreational options, and implement design concepts for safe socialization and recreation in pandemic times","Technologies":"Urban planning and design concepts, landscaping solutions for urban green spaces","People":"Residents, visitors, urban planners","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, design professionals"},{"Description":"Inadequate recreational spaces in public external spaces of apartment complexes","Impact":"Limited space for safe and socially distanced recreation during a pandemic, leading to potential overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Adapt design concepts for inclusion of social pods, implement modular and adaptable recreational spaces in apartment complexes, and provide options for safe socialization and recreation during pandemic times","Technologies":"Modular design concepts, landscaping solutions for outdoor spaces","People":"Apartment residents, visitors","Owner":"Apartment complex management, design professionals"}]}
